title: Group Therapy: He Moved to a Home 30 Minutes Away
description: Someone emailed the show about their mom and dad who are both in a nursing home. Married for a long time, the dad ended up moving to a nursing home 30 minutes away from his wife because he's been seeing a mistress for over 30 years. What side are you on?
itunes:summary: Someone emailed the show about their mom and dad who are both in a nursing home. Married for a long time, the dad ended up moving to a nursing home 30 minutes away from his wife because he's been seeing a mistress for over 30 years. What side are you on?
